description: Brass 481 Plus is a plant growth regulator that contains Brassinolide, a natural plant hormone that helps improve plant growth and yield.
frequency_of_use: Apply 2-3 times during growing season at 15-20 day intervals
side_effect: Generally safe for plants and environment. Use protective equipment during application. Store away from children and animals.
pest: Growth promotion, Flowering enhancement, Fruit development
symptoms: Poor plant growth, reduced flowering, low fruit set, stunted development
causes: Natural plant hormone deficiency affecting growth and development
